name: gardenlawn-admintheme
description: Tailwind build for GardenLawn Admin Theme

scripts.clean-npm: npm config delete python && npm config delete python -g
scripts.clean-all: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean-all-and-install: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install
